content.question: The electric potential difference between two oppositely charged metal parallel plates is <math alttext="20 volts" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>20</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></math>. An electron is released from rest from its position near the negative plate. Which of the following is most nearly the speed of the electron as it reaches the positive plate?

choices.label: <math alttext="3.2 times 10 to the negative 18 power, meter per second " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>3.2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>18</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1.5 times 10 to the negative 5 power, meter per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>1.5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1.9 times 10 to the sixth power, meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>1.9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>6</mn></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2.7 times 10 to the sixth power, meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>2.7</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>6</mn></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="2.7 times 10 to the sixth power, meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>2.7</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>6</mn></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
